subject_reset_request.description: Email subject for Password reset requests

rr_s1.message: You have requested to reset your Webmaker account password.
rr_s1.description: First sentence in the reset request email

rr_s2.message: Click on the button below to set your new password.
rr_s2.description: Second sentence in the reset request email

rr_s3.message: If you didn't request to reset your password, please disregard this email.
rr_s3.description: Third sentence in the reset request email

reset_password_text.description: Text for the reset request link in the email
